author: Tom Bedford
title: Samsung's new affordable 5G phone could be coming very soon
description: The Samsung Galaxy A51 5G looks like it's coming soon, and it could be Samsung's cheapest 5G phone.
content:
The Samsung Galaxy A51 launched in December 2019, but it looks like it could be relaunched soon with the addition of 5G, which would likely make it Samsung's most affordable 5G phone.
As found by SamMobile, the Wi-Fi Alliance has certified a phone with the s… [+1599 chars]
